record.dc:title: 483AN19 Cox Mound, Anderson County, Tennessee. Burial 1AN1. Adult male. On back, left leg vertical. Flesh burial, N-S, head to south, face to left.
record.wpa:narrative: Two pieces of wood, one piece along center of body in vertical axis extending from fibula of right leg to pelvis, then a missing section of seemingly the same piece which begins again at the fourth rib and extends to the edge of the jaw. The second piece 11.5" in length, lying parallel to the right arm.
